lead_paragraph: BARRI--Marlene, died January 27th. Radio Advertising Executive. Survived and loved by her sister and brother-in-law Susan and Harry Wagner, her niece Nicole and nephew Brett. Memorial at Riverside Chapel, 180 West 76th St., New York, January 29th, 11:30am. 1/3
